price: If Allah had known any good in them[11], He would have made them hear, but even if He had made them hear, they would have turned away in aversion.
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: [11] i.e., real willingness and intention of good.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
translations: surely, He (would) have made them hear
surely they would have turned away
